title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: browser, Node, Deno, Bun compatible.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding backend in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI): chat, multi-model, admin panel, file upload, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async, streaming, model management, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple DSL, streaming, model CRUD.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI for Ollama: fast binary, fzf model picker, chat REPL, shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a GitHub Copilot replacement: inline completions, chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples for Linux, macOS, Windows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama: idiomatic Go API, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: TypeScript definitions, browser & server runtimes, zero dependencies.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight wrapper over Ollama REST API, 100 % test coverage.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate: async/tokio, serde, streaming, model ops.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter for Ollama: auto-configuration, @OllamaClient, actuator endpoints.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot powered by Ollama: slash commands, thread chats, model picker, moderation.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma: PDF ingestion, semantic search.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama: model requests, troubleshooting, showcase, community tutorials.
